attributes.action: Have a People's Vote on Martin Selmayr as Secretary-General to the EC.
attributes.background: For as long as we're stuck in the EU, we should probably have a People's Vote to endorse Martin Selmayr as the Secretary-General to the European Commission. He appears to be the only person to have voted. For himself.

rejection.details:
This would be the responsibility of the European Union as a whole and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could start a new petition asking the UK Government to propose that the post of Secretary-General to the European Commission be elected if that is something you would like to see happen.
